overview: Three astronauts doing an exploration mission of a new Galaxy called Palapa. Because the Earth is already destroyed thanks to its people's thirst for power.  The search for a new and unknown Galaxy is the story of their new mini-album 'Galaksi Palapa', which will be released by Kelompok Penerbang Roket in the midst of 2018.
title: Menuju Galaksi Palapa
